text:
b.
Φ : C1 →C0
f ↦→Φ(f) = f′,
where for k ⩾1, Ck denotes the set of k times continuously differen-
tiable functions, and C0 denotes the set of continuous functions.
c.
Φ : R →R
x↦→Φ(x) = cos(x)
c⃝2019 M. P. Deisenroth, A. A. Faisal, C. S. Ong. To be published by Cambridge University Press.
